name: Amnesia (itch) (Fifikus)
description:
Hi all,

This game is the result of my first Game Jam ever (Delthor Game Jam #2 2019) . It was a lot of fun and a great experience. With this game we have won the first place. Awesome!

This game is about someone who has lost his memory and tries to find his way back through the evolution of a game. You need to find and collect all the lost pictures to advance to the next level.

Please take your time and give some feedback in the comments. This will help to improve my future games.

Thank you!

Philipp a.k.a. Fifikus
